question_sessions.question: How much money do you start the game with?
question_sessions.answer: You start with 25 money on your zoo map.

question_sessions.question: How many Zoo cards do you start with?
question_sessions.answer: You draw 8 zoo cards to start the game. Choose 4 of them to keep and discard the remaining 4 cards.

question_sessions.description: Basic follow-up question regarding solo play mode

messages.text: Does Ark nova support solo play?
Yes, Ark Nova supports solo play.

question_sessions.question: How do you adjust the difficulty for that mode?
question_sessions.answer: You can choose different difficulty levels by adjusting the starting appeal. Beginners start with 20 appeal, but you can start with 10 or even 0 appeal for a greater challenge.
